Articles.Content:
**I am excited to present my first KSP Add-on:**

***Model Rocketry***

(Some Kerbal Engineers thought it would be a good idea to upscale model rocket parts in order to save money.)

![wXxCLaX.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/wXxCLaX.png?1)

***Alpha build, needs balancing***

**Downloads:**

![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif ":(") ~~KerbalStuff~~ ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif ":(")

[Releases on Github](https://github.com/SuperRedNova/KSPModelRocketry/releases)

[Source Code](https://github.com/SuperRedNova/KSPModelRocketry)

**Features**

- Scaled Up Model Rocket parts
- A PartModule that allows you to change the color of some of the parts

**Parts**

- Model Kerbal  
*A probe shaped like a kerbal that can be attached by the side or on top of a stack. Has no torque itself. (Inspired by* [*HarvesteR and Moach.*](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/8995-I-have-found-it!!-THE-ORIGINAL-KERBO-LOG)*)*
- Model Engine  
*A solid fuel engine that is meant for use with the other model parts.*
- Model Engine Mount\*  
*A structural piece that you can put the model engine into to make it look nice.*
- Model Tube\*  
*A tube for the body of the rocket. Feel free to stuff things inside of it.*
- Small Model Tube\*  
*A shorter variant of the model tube.*
- Model Nosecone\*  
*What rocket would be complete without a pointy end?*
- Model Fin\*  
*Keeps things going straight... ish.*

\* - Denotes a part that you can change the color of.

**Installation**

1. Unpack the .zip file.
2. Copy the "ModelRocketry" folder into your GameData directory.
3. Boot up KSP and have fun!

**Uninstallation**

1. Delete the "ModelRocketry" folder from your GameData directory.

Licensing can be found with the source code or in the download.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-04-09T18:19:20Z" title="04/09/2016 06:19  PM" data-short="8 yr">April 9, 2016</time> by SuperRedNova**
  
Add-on update for 0.1.7
